reqs:
Pre-reqs: Either (a) MATH 121 or (b) a score of 68% or higher in one of MATH 101, MATH 103, MATH 105, SCIE 001.
The SIS will enforce automatically prerequisites for this course. Students will not be able to register themselves if they do not have the correct prerequisites. If you need to get your UBC file updated with qualifications such as Transfer Credits, take care of that by sending documentation to admissions.inquiry@ubc.ca.

description: Matrices, eigenvectors, diagonalization, orthogonality, linear systems, applications. Intended for Honours students. Please consult the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion List: www.students.ubc.ca/calendar/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.
